con:part.con:content: <definitions name="SdtEndpoint" targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/SdtEndpoint" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/SdtEndpoint" xmlns:breq="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkRequestSchema" xmlns:bresp="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkResponseSchema" xmlns:bfreq="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkFeedbackRequestSchema" xmlns:bfresp="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkFeedbackResponseSchema" xmlns:qreq="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/SubmitQueryRequestSchema" xmlns:qresp="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/SubmitQueryResponseSchema"> <types> <!--Base.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"> <xs:simpleType name="sdtCustomerIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:long"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9][0-9]{7}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="targetApplicationIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="requestTypeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="criteriaTypeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="sdtBulkReferenceType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="29"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="customerReferenceType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="32"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="claimNumberType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9A-Za-z]{8}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="warrantNumberType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9A-Za-z]{8}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="defendantIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="1|2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="lineType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="sotSignatureType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="flag" type="xs:boolean" fixed="true"/> <xs:element name="name"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="courtCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="courtNameType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="40"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="postcodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{1,2}[0-9R][0-9A-Z]? [0-9][A-Z-[CIKMOV]]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="addressType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="line1" type="tns:lineType"/> <xs:element name="line2" type="tns:lineType"/> <xs:element name="line3" type="tns:lineType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="line4" type="tns:lineType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="postcode" type="tns:postcodeType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="requestIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="24"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="sdtRequestIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="40"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="statusCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Ok"/> <xs:enumeration value="Error"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="createStatusCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Accepted"/> <xs:enumeration value="Initially Accepted"/> <xs:enumeration value="Rejected"/> <xs:enumeration value="Error"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="updateStatusCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Accepted"/> <xs:enumeration value="Rejected"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="errorType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="32"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="description"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="255"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="statusType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="error" type="tns:errorType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="code" type="tns:statusCodeType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="createStatusType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="error" type="tns:errorType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="code" type="tns:createStatusCodeType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="updateStatusType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="error" type="tns:errorType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="code" type="tns:updateStatusCodeType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="bulkStatusCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Uploaded"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed"/> <xs:enumeration value="Validated"/> <xs:enumeration value="Completed"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="individualStatusCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Received"/> <xs:enumeration value="Forwarded"/> <xs:enumeration value="Initially Accepted"/> <xs:enumeration value="Accepted"/> <xs:enumeration value="Rejected"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="bulkStatusType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="error" type="tns:errorType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="code" type="tns:bulkStatusCodeType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="individualStatusType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="error" type="tns:errorType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="code" type="tns:individualStatusCodeType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="abstractResponseType" abstract="true"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:statusType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <!--Claim.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:complexType name="claimantType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Describes a claimant</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="address"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="line1" type="base:lineType"/> <xs:element name="line2" type="base:lineType"/> <xs:element name="line3" type="base:lineType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="line4" type="base:lineType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="postcode" type="base:postcodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="particularsType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="45"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="interestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="dailyAmount" type="xs:unsignedLong"/> <xs:element name="owedDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="claimDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="claimAmountInterestBase" type="xs:unsignedLong"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount on which interest should be calculated.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="claimantReferenceType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="24"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="correspondenceDetailType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Describes correspondence details.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="address"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="line1" type="base:lineType"/> <xs:element name="line2" type="base:lineType"/> <xs:element name="postcode" type="base:postcodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="defendantType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Describes a defendant</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="address" type="base:addressType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="claimType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Represents Claim document.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="claimantReference" type="tns:claimantReferenceType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="claimant" type="tns:claimantType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Should be populated if customer is a solicitor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="claimantCorrespondence" type="tns:correspondenceDetailType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Should be populated if customer is not a solicitor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="defendant1" type="tns:defendantType"/> <xs:element name="defendant2" type="tns:defendantType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="sendParticularsSeparately" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="reserveRightToClaimInterest" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="interest" type="tns:interestType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="claimAmount" type="xs:unsignedLong"/> <xs:element name="solicitorCost" type="xs:unsignedLong" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Should be populated only if customer is solicitor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="particulars" type="tns:particularsType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="24"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Details about the claim</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="sotSignature" type="base:sotSignatureType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="mcolClaim" type="tns:claimType"/> </xs:schema> <!--Warrant.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/WarrantSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/WarrantSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:simpleType name="additionalNotesType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="120"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="warrantType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="claimNumber" type="base:claimNumberType"/> <xs:element name="defendantId" type="base:defendantIdType"/> <xs:element name="defendantAddress" type="base:addressType"/> <xs:element name="balanceOfDebt" type="xs:unsignedLong"/> <xs:element name="warrantAmount" type="xs:unsignedLong"/> <xs:element name="solicitorCost" type="xs:unsignedLong" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="additionalNotes" type="tns:additionalNotesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="sotSignature" type="base:sotSignatureType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="mcolWarrant" type="tns:warrantType"/> </xs:schema> <!--Judgment.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/JudgmentSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/JudgmentSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema" xmlns:wnt="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/WarrantSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/WarrantSchema"/> <xs:element name="mcolJudgmentWarrant" type="tns:judgmentWarrantType"/> <xs:complexType name="judgmentWarrantType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="mcolJudgment" type="tns:mcolJudgmentType"/> <xs:element name="mcolWarrant" type="wnt:warrantType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="mcolJudgment" type="tns:mcolJudgmentType"/> <xs:simpleType name="judgmentTypeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="instalmentFrequencyType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="W"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="instalmentPaymentType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Details when payment is to be paid in instalments. The amount cannot be greater than claim amount.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="xs:unsignedLong"/> <xs:element name="frequency" type="tns:instalmentFrequencyType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="fullPaymentType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Details when payment is to be paid in full by a specified date (as opposed to immediately)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="fullByDate" type="xs:date"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The date by which defendant should pay the full amount. Should be in future and not tomorrow.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="immediatePaymentType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Details when payment is to be paid immediately</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="paymentScheduleType"> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="inFullByPayment" type="tns:fullPaymentType"/> <xs:element name="instalment" type="tns:instalmentPaymentType"/> <xs:element name="immediatePayment" type="tns:immediatePaymentType"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="payeeLineType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="35"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="payeeAddressType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="line1" type="tns:payeeLineType"/> <xs:element name="line2" type="tns:payeeLineType"/> <xs:element name="line3" type="tns:payeeLineType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="line4" type="tns:payeeLineType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="line5" type="tns:payeeLineType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="postcode" type="base:postcodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="payeeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="70"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="address" type="tns:payeeAddressType"/> <xs:element name="telephoneNumber" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9][\d-]{0,13}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="dxNumber" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="35"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="faxNumber" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="24"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="email" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="254"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="pcm" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="reference" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="24"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bankAccountNumber" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="8"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bankAccountHolder" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="70"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bankSortCode" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="8"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bankName" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bankInfo1" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bankInfo2" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="slipCodeline1" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="58"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="slipCodeline2" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="58"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="giroAccountNumber" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="8"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="giroTransCode1" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="giroTransCode2" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="apacsTransCode" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="mcolJudgmentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="claimNumber" type="base:claimNumberType"/> <xs:element name="jointJudgment" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="judgmentType" type="tns:judgmentTypeType"/> <xs:element name="sentParticularsSeparately" type="xs:boolean" fixed="true" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="defendantId" type="base:defendantIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="defendant1Address" type="base:addressType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="defendant1DateOfBirth" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="defendant2Address" type="base:addressType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="defendant2DateOfBirth" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="paymentSchedule" type="tns:paymentScheduleType"/> <xs:element name="interest" type="xs:unsignedLong" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="solicitorCost" type="xs:unsignedLong" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="deductedAmount" type="xs:unsignedLong" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="judgmentAmount" type="xs:unsignedLong" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="payee" type="tns:payeeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="sotSignature" type="base:sotSignatureType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <!--ClaimStatusUpdate.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimStatusUpdateSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimStatusUpdateSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:simpleType name="notificationType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="MP"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Paid</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="WO"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Written Off</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="WD"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Withdrawn</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DI"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Discontinued</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="claimStatusUpdateType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="claimNumber" type="base:claimNumberType"/> <xs:element name="defendantId" type="base:defendantIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="notificationType" type="tns:notificationType"/> <xs:element name="paidInFullDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="mcolClaimStatusUpdate" type="tns:claimStatusUpdateType"/> </xs:schema> <!--McolQuery.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/QuerySchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/QuerySchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:complexType name="mcolDefenceCriteriaType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="fromDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="toDate" type="xs:date"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="mcolDefenceCriteria" type="tns:mcolDefenceCriteriaType"/> <xs:complexType name="mcolDefenceDetailType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="claimNumber" type="base:claimNumberType"/> <xs:element name="defendantResponse" type="tns:defendantResponseType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="defendantResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="filedDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="raisedOnMcol" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="responseType" type="tns:responseType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="defendantId" type="base:defendantIdType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="responseType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DE"/> <xs:enumeration value="DC"/> <xs:enumeration value="PA"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="mcolDefenceDetail" type="tns:mcolDefenceDetailType"/> </xs:schema> <!--McolResponseDetail.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ResponseDetailSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ResponseDetailSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:complexType name="responseDetailType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="claimNumber" type="base:claimNumberType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="issueDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="serviceDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="firstPaymentDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="warrantNumber" type="base:warrantNumberType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="enforcingCourtCode" type="base:courtCodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="enforcingCourtName" type="base:courtNameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="fee" type="xs:unsignedLong" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="judgmentWarrantStatus" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="255"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="mcolResponseDetail" type="tns:responseDetailType"/> </xs:schema> <!--BulkSubmitRequest.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkRequestSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkRequestSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema" xmlns:clm="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimSchema" xmlns:jud="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/JudgmentSchema" xmlns:clmupd="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimStatusUpdateSchema" xmlns:wnt="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/WarrantSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimSchema"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/JudgmentSchema"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimStatusUpdateSchema"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/WarrantSchema"/> <xs:simpleType name="requestCountType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:long"> <xs:maxInclusive value="2000"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="headerType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sdtCustomerId" type="base:sdtCustomerIdType"/> <xs:element name="targetApplicationId" type="base:targetApplicationIdType"/> <xs:element name="requestCount" type="tns:requestCountType"/> <xs:element name="customerReference" type="base:customerReferenceType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="requestItemType"> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="mcolClaim" type="clm:claimType"/> <xs:element name="mcolJudgment" type="jud:mcolJudgmentType"/> <xs:element name="mcolClaimStatusUpdate" type="clmupd:claimStatusUpdateType"/> <xs:element name="mcolWarrant" type="wnt:warrantType"/> <xs:element name="mcolJudgmentWarrant" type="jud:judgmentWarrantType"/> </xs:choice> <xs:attribute name="requestType" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="requestId" type="base:requestIdType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="requestsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="request" type="tns:requestItemType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="2000"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="bulkRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="header" type="tns:headerType"/> <xs:element name="requests" type="tns:requestsType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="bulkRequest" type="tns:bulkRequestType"/> </xs:schema> <!--BulkSubmitResponse.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkResponseSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkResponseSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:complexType name="bulkResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="base:abstractResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="customerReference" type="base:customerReferenceType"/> <xs:element name="sdtBulkReference" type="base:sdtBulkReferenceType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="submittedDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="sdtService" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="requestCount" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="bulkResponse" type="tns:bulkResponseType"/> </xs:schema> <!--BulkFeedbackRequest.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkFeedbackRequestSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkFeedbackRequestSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:complexType name="bulkFeedbackRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="header" type="tns:headerType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="headerType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sdtCustomerId" type="base:sdtCustomerIdType"/> <xs:element name="sdtBulkReference" type="base:sdtBulkReferenceType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="bulkFeedbackRequest" type="tns:bulkFeedbackRequestType"/> </xs:schema> <!--BulkFeedbackResponse.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkFeedbackResponseSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkFeedbackResponseSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema" xmlns:mresp="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ResponseDetailSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ResponseDetailSchema"/> <xs:complexType name="bulkRequestStatusType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="base:abstractResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="customerReference" type="base:customerReferenceType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="sdtBulkReference" type="base:sdtBulkReferenceType"/> <xs:element name="submittedDate" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="sdtService" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="requestCount" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="bulkStatus" type="base:bulkStatusType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="responsesType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="response" type="tns:responseType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="responseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="responseDetail"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="mcolResponseDetail" type="mresp:responseDetailType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="status" type="base:individualStatusType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="requestType" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="requestId" type="base:requestIdType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="bulkFeedbackResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="bulkRequestStatus" type="tns:bulkRequestStatusType"/> <xs:element name="responses" type="tns:responsesType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="bulkFeedbackResponse" type="tns:bulkFeedbackResponseType"/> </xs:schema> <!--SubmitQueryRequest.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/SubmitQueryRequestSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/SubmitQueryRequestSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema" xmlns:mqry="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/QuerySchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/QuerySchema"/> <xs:element name="submitQueryRequest" type="tns:submitQueryRequestType"/> <xs:complexType name="submitQueryRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="header" type="tns:headerType"/> <xs:element name="criteria" type="tns:criteriaType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="headerType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sdtCustomerId" type="base:sdtCustomerIdType"/> <xs:element name="targetApplicationId" type="base:targetApplicationIdType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="criteriaType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="criterion" type="tns:criterionType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="criterionType"> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="mcolDefenceCriteria" type="mqry:mcolDefenceCriteriaType"/> </xs:choice> <xs:attribute name="criteriaType" type="base:criteriaTypeType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <!--SubmitQueryResponse.xsd--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/SubmitQueryResponseSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/SubmitQueryResponseSchema" xmlns:base="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema" xmlns:mqry="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/QuerySchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/QuerySchema"/> <xs:element name="submitQueryResponse" type="tns:submitQueryResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="submitQueryResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="base:abstractResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sdtCustomerId" type="base:sdtCustomerIdType"/> <xs:element name="sdtService" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="resultCount" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"/> <xs:element name="results" type="tns:resultsType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="resultsType"> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="mcolDefenceDetail" type="mqry:mcolDefenceDetailType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </types> <message name="submitBulkRequest"> <part name="bulkRequest" element="breq:bulkRequest"/> </message> <message name="submitBulkResponse"> <part name="bulkResponse" element="bresp:bulkResponse"/> </message> <message name="bulkFeedbackRequest"> <part name="bulkFeedbackRequest" element="bfreq:bulkFeedbackRequest"/> </message> <message name="bulkFeedbackResponse"> <part name="bulkFeedbackResponse" element="bfresp:bulkFeedbackResponse"/> </message> <message name="submitQueryRequest"> <part name="submitQueryRequest" element="qreq:submitQueryRequest"/> </message> <message name="submitQueryResponse"> <part name="submitQueryResponse" element="qresp:submitQueryResponse"/> </message> <portType name="ISdtEndpointPortType"> <operation name="submitBulk"> <input message="tns:submitBulkRequest"/> <output message="tns:submitBulkResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="getBulkFeedback"> <input message="tns:bulkFeedbackRequest"/> <output message="tns:bulkFeedbackResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="submitQuery"> <input message="tns:submitQueryRequest"/> <output message="tns:submitQueryResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="SdtEndpointHttpPortBinding" type="tns:ISdtEndpointPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="submitBulk"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="getBulkFeedback"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="submitQuery"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="SdtEndpoint"> <port name="SdtEndpointPort" binding="tns:SdtEndpointHttpPortBinding"> <soap:address location="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/sdt/service"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

con:call.name: Valid
con:call.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:bul="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkRequestSchema" xmlns:cla="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimSchema" xmlns:bas="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema" xmlns:jud="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/JudgmentSchema" xmlns:cla1="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimStatusUpdateSchema" xmlns:war="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/WarrantSchema"> <soap:Header/> <soap:Body> <bul:bulkRequest> <bul:header> <bul:sdtCustomerId>12345678</bul:sdtCustomerId> <bul:targetApplicationId>mcol</bul:targetApplicationId> <bul:requestCount>1</bul:requestCount> <bul:customerReference>abc1223456</bul:customerReference> </bul:header> <bul:requests> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <bul:request requestType="mcolClaimStatusUpdate" requestId="1"> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 5 items at this level--> <bul:mcolClaimStatusUpdate> <cla1:claimNumber>claim123</cla1:claimNumber> <!--Optional:--> <cla1:defendantId>1</cla1:defendantId> <cla1:notificationType>MP</cla1:notificationType> <!--Optional:--> <cla1:paidInFullDate>2012-01-01</cla1:paidInFullDate> </bul:mcolClaimStatusUpdate> </bul:request> </bul:requests> </bul:bulkRequest> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:call.name: Duplicate Customer Ref
con:call.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:bul="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BulkRequestSchema" xmlns:cla="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimSchema" xmlns:bas="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/sdt/BaseSchema" xmlns:jud="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/JudgmentSchema" xmlns:cla1="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/ClaimStatusUpdateSchema" xmlns:war="http://ws.sdt.moj.gov.uk/2013/mcol/WarrantSchema"> <soap:Header/> <soap:Body> <bul:bulkRequest> <bul:header> <bul:sdtCustomerId>12345678</bul:sdtCustomerId> <bul:targetApplicationId>mcol</bul:targetApplicationId> <bul:requestCount>1</bul:requestCount> <bul:customerReference>duplicate</bul:customerReference> </bul:header> <bul:requests> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <bul:request requestType="mcolClaimStatusUpdate" requestId="1"> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 5 items at this level--> <bul:mcolClaimStatusUpdate> <cla1:claimNumber>claim123</cla1:claimNumber> <!--Optional:--> <cla1:defendantId>1</cla1:defendantId> <cla1:notificationType>MP</cla1:notificationType> <!--Optional:--> <cla1:paidInFullDate>2012-01-01</cla1:paidInFullDate> </bul:mcolClaimStatusUpdate> </bul:request> </bul:requests> </bul:bulkRequest> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:call.name: req count error
